class.name: PIXI.Ellipse

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The X coordinate of the center of the ellipse

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The Y coordinate of the center of the ellipse

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: The half width of this ellipse

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: The half height of this ellipse

class.help: The Ellipse object can be used to specify a hit area for displayObjects

public.name: clone
public.help: Creates a clone of this Ellipse instance

public.name: contains

returns.help: Whether the x/y coords are within this ellipse

public.help: Checks whether the x and y coordinates given are contained within this ellipse

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The X coordinate of the point to test

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The Y coordinate of the point to test

public.name: getBounds
public.help: Returns the framing rectangle of the ellipse as a PIXI.Rectangle object
